title: Leo Grey Serving Spoon
description: Serve up mashed potatoes, rice or stews in a jiffy with the Leo serving spoon! The heat-resistant silicone spoon wont scratch your delicate cookware while the soft-touch rubber handle ensures a comfortable grip when youre scooping up your ingredients. When youre done eating, just put the spoon in the dishwasher together with your pans and use the hanging loop for convenient storage.Comfortable gripSafe for use with non-stick cookwareClean, classic designMade of nylon
